website_summaries.verdict: Two big bags of organic seeds ideal for baking. Good quantity for the price.
pros: Certified organic and offers earthy flavor
Big seeds bursting with good oils
A great addition to any healthy diet
Has long expiration date of two years if kept refrigerated
cons: Need grinder to grind into powder for edible consumption
Some packages had small rocks, soil, and grit
No salt added, so they have little to no flavor

customer_reviews.title: NOW? Nope, Never.
customer_reviews.text: These may be a "bargain" (I found them in my local store for less), but there are better brands. I generally like NOW products, but these aren't their shining stars. They don't have a wonderful scent, and even after toasting them, they lack that nutty flavor. I don't want to "j'accuse" that they've turned, but I'd recommend buying Spectrum, Bob's or even Trader Joe's over these.
customer_reviews.author: My Little Blue Heron

customer_reviews.title: We used a cheap $10 coffee grinder from Walmart and the flax is awesome. We are on a LCHF (Low Carb High ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a TON of flax and to receive the nutritional benefits, you must have something to ground it up with. We used a cheap $10 coffee grinder from Walmart and the flax is awesome. We are on a LCHF (Low Carb High Fat) diet similar to Atkins and this was perfect for raising the fiber count to negate the carbs. You can throw the powder in everything, we would make dips and throw some in there for additional nutritional benefits
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Callaway

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: The price is excellent for this organic product. You get 2 bags! The expiration date is over 2 years away and it is packaged well. The seeds are uniform,clean and very nutritious. Throw them in oatmeal, vegie loaf or muffins. High fiber so remember to drink lots of water :)
customer_reviews.author: Nightmary

customer_reviews.title: Can use as egg substitute for vegan cooking
customer_reviews.text: We now have a vegan in the family who taught me to substitute an egg by mixing one tablespoon of flax seed with enough water to moisten them, then let it sit for a few minutes before adding to recipe such as for muffins. This creates a minor gelling effect that mimics the binding power of an egg. These NOW-brand flax seeds are great! I haven't tried ground flax seed yet. Just know that you will see the seeds in the finished product. They are good for you so seeing the seeds are fine with me.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S

customer_reviews.title: NOW Foods Organic Golden Flax Seeds - Fiber Makes It Come Out Right
customer_reviews.text: I like Organic Flax Seeds. Most of it is Fiber and we all need that to keep everything moving (if you know what I mean);. Don't laugh; watch the Saturday Night Live skit with Dana Carvey, Kevin Nealon and Nora Dunn as Peggy Lee singing "Fiber" instead of "Fever!" This will tell you all you need to know about Fiber. UPDATE 04-12-2019 Just ordered the 2-pack again and will do so, AGAIN. Fiber truly does keep you regular. The more the better! UPDATE 04-27-2019 Just received ANOTHER 2-pack today! What can I say; I need my fiber!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Non-GMO Foodie Biker

customer_reviews.title: Flaxseed for the fam
customer_reviews.text: My family has really enjoyed this flaxseed. We are vegetarians and try to incorporate sources of Omega 3's in our diets. I made energy bites with flaxseed, peanut butter, oats, honey, and dark chocolate chips and it is a hit with the whole fam. This is a great amount of flaxseed too- I have one bag frozen for later!
customer_reviews.author: EJW

customer_reviews.title: Good flaxseed
customer_reviews.text: I ground the whole flaxseed daily and use it over my Budwig muesli, use it on my salads, use it on my oatmeal, and many other uses. Flaxseed is a great use for overall health and a good cancer fighter.
customer_reviews.author: Ladygator

customer_reviews.title: Another delicious NOW Foods item
customer_reviews.text: Great, of course, as a sub for eggs to use as a binder. I just ground up some in my VitaMix this morning for that very purpose. This is 2 bags of flax seed for a very good price. Also, I like everything I've ever tried from NOW Foods. Have used their protein powders, organic coconut oil--which is the best I ever tasted or smelled--& many other NOW Foods products & have never been disappointed in anything.
customer_reviews.author: Saoirse the dancer

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for a good product.
customer_reviews.text: I use it every morning on my husband's cottage cheese/flax seed oil cancer diet. I grind it in a coffee grinder and sprinkle it on top and then add fresh fruit. His tumor is getting smaller. Thank you for a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Sharyn B.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to imagine life without flax seed.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful flax seeds. I use them in my fruit smoothies, in my cookies, muffins, and even pancakes. My daughter in law gave me a great recipe for pancakes - equal parts ground flax seed and ground oats. Add egg, milk and that's it. They don't need baking powder or baking soda because they fry flat, but they taste naturally sweet and delicious. Add fruit afterward and you're done. No pancake syrup either. Yum Yum Yum.
customer_reviews.author: bronxer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and service.
customer_reviews.text: Our local market stopped carrying Red Mill whole flax seed.....I like to grind my own at the moment I use it.....so I checked Amazon and ordered this. Perfect! In two days my ordered arrived. The packaging is very handsome and the zip-lock bags are much sturdier than the Red Mill’s. I will continue buying this high quality brand from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Smokey

customer_reviews.title: Grate flax seeds
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and not expensive. I soak 2 Tbs of flax seeds overnight + 1Tbs black sesame seeds and 1 Tbs of black cumin seeds in cup of water. Next day i add another 1,5 cups of water and make smoothie every day and feel great, the blood pressure is stabilized, no more headache . I feel brand new !
customer_reviews.author: Maria M.

customer_reviews.title: Not real
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think these were a genuine product this time. Totally different quality than in the past. Multiple colored seeds. Hard chunks of dirt in it.
customer_reviews.author: I love books

customer_reviews.title: Great for preventive health care
customer_reviews.text: I bought flax seeds because Michael Greger, MD recommends them for prostate issues, and I don't want to develop those kind of issues as I age. I've read that a member of the San Antonia vegan society cured his prostate cancer with flaxseeds. You have to grind them, and I prefer to grind them myself, rather than buy them ground or milled. Hopeful.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Blumberg

customer_reviews.title: Great Brand!
customer_reviews.text: Love the taste of these seeds - clean, light, fresh! The great thing about these seeds is if you need meal to mix in recipes or smoothies all you have to do is throw them in your nutibullet or similar and it creates a beautifully fine meal. My go to brand!
customer_reviews.author: Tarra T!

customer_reviews.title: RANCID 🤢
customer_reviews.text: Both bags I received are rancid, even though the expiration date is two years away. They have a strong fish odor, and the seeds are bitter. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Claire C.

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Placed in freezer when I purchased. As I started using the product, I noticed a fishy smell. As we researched, we found that that mean it is rancid.
customer_reviews.author: Liv Saunders

customer_reviews.title: not ground
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were ground flax seeds and they are not. they are whole. ugh. should have read closer. oh well. i'll put them in the blender. still have great nutritional value which is what i bought them for.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Trav

customer_reviews.title: Add these to your diet
customer_reviews.text: Tried to make a habit of adding these to my diet daily and these large bags have made it a lot easier. They go well in everything from smoothies to cookies to oatmeal.
customer_reviews.author: CHarp

customer_reviews.title: Good over granola, salads, and soups
customer_reviews.text: Since I grind these flax seeds myself, I have them fresh when I want them. I like to sprinkle a teaspoon on my granola every morning, but they are also good over salads or soups.
customer_reviews.author: gooneybird

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product and great honest company!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I am so glad that I found this product. I purchased two 16 oz bags for $11.49 plus free two day shipping. Now Foods is a wonderful company. So far, I am loving all of the products. There are tons of nutritional benefits in this bag. It is an amazing addition to my smoothies. Cons: Now Foods Organic Flax Seeds are whole, which is hard to get the nutrients in that form. It goes in and out (potty). You have to grind the seeds first. Either the hard way by hand or use a coffee bean or herb grinder.
customer_reviews.author: Kye86

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and price.
customer_reviews.text: I add these to a recipe for "overnight oatmeal" for their nutritional value and the bit of crunch they contribute to the texture. They are packed in a heavy resealable bag that is good for storage in itself, or the seeds can easily be poured into another storage container without spillage. The price is more reasonable than can be found in our local stores.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for You
customer_reviews.text: These are very fresh and are part of my daily source of healthy food.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff E. Cummins

customer_reviews.title: Great Flax Seeds
customer_reviews.text: These are great flax seeds. I put them in the homemade bread I make and it always comes out very yummy. Will definitely be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Good flaxseed and good price
customer_reviews.text: It's a good flaxseed and I like the fact that it's organic. I grind it up and put it in the bottom of my coffee cup. You have to keep stirring, so it doesn't clump up, but it adds a nutty flavor to my coffee.
customer_reviews.author: outdoors gal

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great buying experience.
customer_reviews.text: I was wondering what will I be able to use flax seed on, I know your suppose to make it part of your diet because of its many health benefits. The answer ended up being for me many different things, I grind the flax seed in a little processor and use it every opportunity I get. fruits and vegetables, salads, sandiiches ,I really like the taste of flaxseed after its ground it tastes like nutty a kind of cereal if you east a finger full, but much healthier for me. its not a strong flavor but it very good..
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent brand and product but...buy from the bulk section of your grocery store.  Cheaper!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent brand and product but...buy from the bulk section of your grocery store. Cheaper! Runs about $3/pound at Whole Foods.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way!
customer_reviews.text: Whole (not ground) beautiful, big flax seeds. Bursting with the good oils we all need in our bodies! Golden color - Great Taste! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Bert

customer_reviews.title: Healthy for baby chics.
customer_reviews.text: Gave to the baby chicks to vary their diet. Healthy. Could probably get in larger quantities for cheaper price for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: MarleneLouiseTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love golden flax! This is one of the fresher brands I have tried
customer_reviews.author: MeDon

customer_reviews.title: Tastes better than others I've tried.
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a flax I can tolerate--taste-wise. Also, I think getting whole seeds will allow it to last a very long time. I use my cheap coffee grinder to grind a couple of tablespoons at a time. I had been using Bobs Redmill ground brown flax. The flavor cold wasn't terrible, but once it was warmed up (cooked into something), I found it very hard to ingest. Cinnamon--lots of it--helped, but this is much better.
customer_reviews.author: A RHEA

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Works effectively. I put it on my yogurt everyday for breakfast
customer_reviews.author: Lol

customer_reviews.title: Healthy eating!
customer_reviews.text: I use flax seed in my smoothies all the time. My son uses it in his yogurt. We both are trying to eat healthier.
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: fresh and good
customer_reviews.text: These flax seeds have taken a permanent place in my diet, and the NOW Foods Certified Organic are some of the best flax seeds I have used. My only complaint is that they don't reseal very well after opening, but I use a bag clip and all is good. They are always fresh and getting two bags at such a great price makes me even happier.
customer_reviews.author: Carla J

customer_reviews.title: I believe that a good healthy diet is helping them have a happy life ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been raising canaries for over 50 years. I try to feed them different foods, seeds, grains and always fresh Romaine, Broccoli Cucumber slices Kale and other fresh greens and fruits. On the average they live into their late teens. I believe that a good healthy diet is helping them have a happy life and these Golden Flax seeds are one of their favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Gartenberg

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Store on your Shelf!
customer_reviews.text: I use ground flax seeds every day and find that this purchase of 2 packs is great. I like to grind my own. The packaging is very easy to reseal and I don't have to store the whole seeds in another air tight container. By buying the whole seeds I have the ability to use both whole or ground. I use my little Ninja (Amazon purchase) and its great for grinding and other little "chores".
customer_reviews.author: D H Leschot

customer_reviews.title: Quality flaxseed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this flaxseed to make hair gel. Came timely, great packaging, and was exactly what I ordered. The quality is top notch. The gel is so thick and wonderful from these seeds. It’s keeping really well in the fridge. When I need more I’ll be ordering this again.
customer_reviews.author: BattJackson

customer_reviews.title: Good and quality product !!
customer_reviews.text: Good source of fiber. Needs to grind first before adding in my cereals, salad ,etc Package arrived in good condition too & good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: I don't know that flax seeds look like sesame seeds
customer_reviews.text: I don't know that flax seeds look like sesame seeds. I tried it for the first time on my Nutribullet shake and I like it. I will be using more of it on my Asian desserts and other Asian dishes that requires sesame seeds, this is a healthier substitute . I recommend this. Good packaging and shipping was quick.
customer_reviews.author: Aria

customer_reviews.title: These flax seed a have a great nutty taste and I run them through my nutri- ...
customer_reviews.text: These flax seed a have a great nutty taste and I run them through my nutri- bullet to make powder, as our bodies cannot digest the seed. I find that it helps with constipation as well as numerous other health benefits. Also this organic seed is less calories than others I have looked at.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Worth

customer_reviews.title: Definitely ordering again
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. I add this to my oatmeal and its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is great. It is much better to get the seeds ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great. It is much better to get the seeds and grind them yourself, then to buy pre-ground flax. I bought a very inexpensive coffee grinder at Wal-Mart that does a great job at grinding this.
customer_reviews.author: poopsy

customer_reviews.title: A real deal!
customer_reviews.text: I was very satisfied with my recent flax seed purchase from Now Foods. The product came as advertised and contained the two bags shown in the on-line photo. Try finding two 16 oz bags of flax seeds for this price at any whole food store. I will ordering from this company again. The products were delivered within 5 days....actually they were here in three. Also very easy to grind in my nutri-bullet.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Great for you and so easy to incorporate into your diet. I ground all the seeds, as per many reviewers, and simply use a spoon of the stuff in anything I can get it in. It's easy to get it into any food and you hardly even notice it's there. Easy and very healthy addition to any diet. Must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Alex G

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: Sweet and delicious these are NOT. But then again, it's flax seeds we're talking about. But they do give you plenty of FIBER and they do fight prostate cancer. And that's why I bought them. I DON'T WANT CANCER!! I bought a ton of these to pass around to my family and so far no complaints other than..."eat too much, run to the bathroom". A teaspoon a day works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Fel Angel

customer_reviews.title: Great Product , enjoying it so much
customer_reviews.text: I love the taste , freshness and everything about this product definitely buying again
customer_reviews.author: zahraa

customer_reviews.title: but other than that - it's great!
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes there are different particles/seeds that I filter out. I think it could have been cleaner, but other than that - it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Yury

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to grind and sneak on your food. I also use them to make my homemade bread. I love them for everything! I also use them to thicken my oatmeal should I put a little too much liquid in. In fact they could be used they could be ground with your spice grinder and used to thicken anything and it has little to no taste and is so healthy for you!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Delicious, high quality flax seeds. Use them for tea and they taste perfect and do what they’re supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: MTapia

customer_reviews.title: Great Superfood for your skin and hair
customer_reviews.text: This is a great superfood with no overpowered taste. It can add subsistence to smoothies or other health food concoctions without messing up your flavor profile. Incorporate this into your everyday diet and you'll see you skin, hair and nails start to glow and shine.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B. Greenman

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love this stuff canit get enough
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love this stuff canit get enough! I am on my second order and this is the best brand of Flax seeds I have tried. I use them to make a flax seed gel for my hair and a leave in conditioner. I will never buy another brand and I have tried a few
customer_reviews.author: The Buchanans

customer_reviews.title: Buy this Product it's Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The product came in excellent condition. Both packages were sealed together. I use flax seed powder and will continue to buy this product. For those out there who think it might not taste good, your wrong. The flavor doesn't change the item your using it for. I use it in my energy drinks along with protein powder, excellent way to start your day.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Todd Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great digestive aid
customer_reviews.text: It is very good. I ground it up and add it to almost any food especially smoothies. It is great for the digestion and has many other health benefits. Best to be consumed right away after adding to drinks, because it will thicken the liquid and then one has to eat it with a spoon. Not bad either this way.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Great for adding fiber to your diet
customer_reviews.text: Great for adding fiber to your diet. Grind them up in coffee mill as finely as possible and add to oatmeal or cold cereal. A tablespoon a day is about right. This brand has a very neutral taste which is great. I've recently seen ground flax seeds at Trader Joe's for a much better price, so will probably get from there from now on though.
customer_reviews.author: palishopper

customer_reviews.title: Nice value
customer_reviews.text: I didn't purchase this as a food item; it was to mix with crushed lavender inside eye aromatherapy pillows that I make. So, I can't speak to the food aspect of this, but it worked well with what I needed it for. Nice transaction and good price!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product at a good price. It s easy to use in shakes, salads, etc... Good way to get the nutrition without a lot of trouble.
customer_reviews.author: TeriH

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Flaxseed is a addition to your diet as it is a great source of fider and healthy fatty acids. At first I was using the flaxseed capsules, but I found adding the pure seeds to my diet more beneficial, so I add them to either my protein shakes, or I wil sprinkle some over my oatmeal. This brand is good because you get two packs for the price of one which is a great and will last a while. Overall great deal.
customer_reviews.author: kee

customer_reviews.title: These seemed fresh and I love that they are resealable
customer_reviews.text: These seemed fresh and I love that they are resealable. I grind then myself in a coffee grinder. I like that because they are the golden flaxseed, they won't show if they get stuck in your teeth after morning oatmeal... But they don't have as nice of a nutty flavor as the darker flaxseed.
customer_reviews.author: Chyna

customer_reviews.title: flaxseed gel
customer_reviews.text: i use this to make flax seed gel. its great. affordable considering how many times you can reuse this as well as in many diffrent ways
customer_reviews.author: Jovanna

customer_reviews.title: take one --table spoon 3x a day.
customer_reviews.text: I DO NOT GRIND MINE GOLDEN flax---2 pkgs. a VERY GOOD LOW COST product--and good for U ! fast ship. bbbp okc 68
customer_reviews.author: BbP

customer_reviews.title: I love Flax Seeds
customer_reviews.text: Amazing I use my flax seeds in my nom nom Paleo Bars. Thank you for such an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest, The Green Hair Doc

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, easily ground and mixed.
customer_reviews.text: Fresh, tasty, and easily ground with my walnuts to add into my morning smoothie!!!! Will definitely re-order! Awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Lighthouse55

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition To Your Morning Smoothie
customer_reviews.text: I use Flax Seeds in my morning smoothies (based on the recommendation of my internist). I love these organic golden seeds. It adds a slightly nutty flavor to your shake and the health benefits are fantastic. I like the price on these as well. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: A Gamer at Heart

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy and satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: Following our Doctor's advice I bought this product for my husband, who is diabetic. He started a new healthy diet with juices and smoothies and I put 1tsp of golden flax seed on either the juice or the smoothie, surprisingly amazingly is been decreasing my husband sugar levels!!! I'm very happy and satisfied with this product. I gave 5 stars and highly recommend!!! Thank you for making a difference not only on my husband but my kids health!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steph914

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Golden Flax Seeds
customer_reviews.text: High quality Golden Flax Seeds. Golden Flax seed should be gold/yellow in color. I grind the seeds up in a coffee grinder and add to hot cereal like oat meal. I also add it to various smoothies to get extra fiber. The color when ground is a really nice yellow.
customer_reviews.author: Impedimentus

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!
customer_reviews.text: The price is excellent for this organic product. You get 2 bags!.The seeds are uniform, clean and very nutritious. I use coffee grinder and then throw them in oatmeal, or muffins. High fiber so remember to drink lots of water :) Grind as needed because flax seed will go rancid fast.
customer_reviews.author: JACQUELINE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very good tasting and so good for you too.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: Nutritious
customer_reviews.text: I needed to add fiber to my diet and these do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: bh

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Like to grind in the blender and use in different ways either to salad, smoothie oatmeal or chia seed pudding!
customer_reviews.author: KNE

customer_reviews.title: Now Foods Certified Organic Golden Flax Seeds-Yummy
customer_reviews.text: Golden color and very, very fine with a delicious taste. I put them on my Farina and blend them into my smoothies and they blend nicely with no grit at all. I'd definitely order from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Snook

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time to place order for this and I am happy with quality of it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Fact!

customer_reviews.title: Yummy in yogurt
customer_reviews.text: Love this in my morning yogurt provides a great nutty crunch while providing additional fiber to my diet, my greek yogurt is just a little boring without the Flax Seeds. Also great in salads and sandwiches to add a little nutty crunch.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: I truly love this product
customer_reviews.text: I truly love this product! You get two bags at an amazing price. The expiration date is over two years away and it is packaged well, so unless you forget to seal the bag you'll have it around for a while. It is high in fiber so remember to drink lots of water.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Arlem Molina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this use it for my smoothie. will definitely buy this again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my flax seeds
customer_reviews.text: Love my flax seeds. I also use these in soups, salads, slaws, a lot of things I cook. They are very good for you. I will be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Carlund Williams

customer_reviews.title: Cannot imagine anything better unless it cleaned my house
customer_reviews.text: Oh my, beautiful golden organic flax seeds these are. The pack of two was a thoughtful plan. You can keep the remainder in the freezer or someplace cool. I purchased a Krups F203 Electric spice and coffee grinder with my first order, on recommendations of other buyers here at Amazon. Together the two work in perfect unison. I keep the grinder on the cabinet surface, with some meal at the ready at all times. If I were the sellers, I would change the outside of the package to show more of the actual seeds themselves -they are the true stars and new buyers would appreciate how lovely they are.
customer_reviews.author: Braveshopper

customer_reviews.title: I use this daily!
customer_reviews.text: I recently started using this stuff and had no idea of how much nutrition i was missing out on this stuff! One ounce has: Omega-3 (ALA) 6,338mg Fiber 8g Protein 6g Vitamin B1 31% RDA Manganese 35% RDA Magnesium 30% RDA Phosphorus 19% RDA Selenium 10% RDA Also, flaxseeds contain a good amount of vitamin B6, Iron, potassium, copper and zinc. It's high in fiber but low in carbs! I've noticed a substantial amount of weight loss with healthier skin and hair. This stuff has so many benefits, you need to try it out for yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Natural and works
customer_reviews.text: If your constipated or not regular, use this. It is great for your digestion without taking the lousy drugs with side effects.
customer_reviews.author: snsliberty

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time trying these flex seeds. They are excellent. I like the idea of getting two bags. When needed, I will buy this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: careful of what you eat
customer_reviews.text: I was adding these to my foods. After months of eating these I had such stomach pain. I went to ER & learned I have diverticulitis. They are good for your skin for moisture. Unfortunately, some of us can't foods with little seeds.
customer_reviews.author: LETTIE

customer_reviews.title: What can you say about flax seeds?
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about flax seeds? If you don't use them, you don't care. LOL Fresh tasting and eating. I've made brownies by grinding these up... good brownies.
customer_reviews.author: josaysso

customer_reviews.title: Great product for my low carb recipes.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I use it in my low carb recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Flax seed is amazing for health benefits and this organic one is so delicious. I love, my husband loves it and so do my kids. I use it in trail mix or grind it up and bake with it. Excellent product and good packaging!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Meifert

customer_reviews.title: Of course the best ways to determine both good value and a good ...
customer_reviews.text: Of course the best ways to determine both good value and a good produce is repeat sales, I have purchased this item 4 times
customer_reviews.author: ccphilly

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, organic product
customer_reviews.text: Taste is good and organic quality appears excellent. The price is great for 2 bags. Found delivery quick, packaging careful and professional. Would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie S. Pannone

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Good packaging. Outstanding delivery. OK, I think that covers it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: If you want to get back to regularity in your digestion system this will do the trick. You must take it on a regular basis to keep your body in tune. Not once in a while. I do smoothies it's the best but you can mix them in your bars too...
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Sherpa

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff
customer_reviews.text: Saw them on a television show and decided to try them - absoutely delicious. Put together a "trail mix" of Goji berries, dried bananas and unsalted mixed nuts with the flax seeds and can't stop eating them. Fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Arthur J. Filler, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great and healthy!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! I grind them up and use them in my morning smoothie. They have a nice, nutty flavor. Product arrived quickly and was exactly as described. Would recommend and buy from this Seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Z

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I keep my seeds and nuts in the freezer, and grind the flax seed fresh before each use. My favorite snack is freshly ground flax sprinkled over plain, unsweetened Greek yogurt. Tonight I added some fresh strawberries.
customer_reviews.author: patricia

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, easy to use and good for me!
customer_reviews.text: I put this (2 tablespoons) in a grinder and use it in my smoothies, salads, on my bagel's cream cheese, meatloaf, green beans, eggs, and by itself with Chia seeds to quickly fill up when I have no time. Heart Healthy!
customer_reviews.author: MDC

customer_reviews.title: Great for my use.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for flax seed hair goo and they work perfectly. The size and cost of these seeds vs others I looked at seems good. I don't have anything to compare this too but they work well for me!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany C. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Organic Flax Seed!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and as described. My favorite flax seed. I buy many bags at a time and freeze it so I am never without. Great health benefits! I really enjoy my Amazon prime . . . .quick delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: I got two packages that I grind up in my Nutri-bullet and put in the fridge, sprinkle on yogurt, in cereal (both hot and cold) can use in a meatloaf (to sneak it in without the family knowing:) and best in smoothies!!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Bandini

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful quality - I use one tablespoon daily in my ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful quality - I use one tablespoon daily in my vegetable smoothie with my Nutri-Bullet and begin my day with energy :)
customer_reviews.author: D. Z.

customer_reviews.title: A very good product and I imagine
customer_reviews.text: A very good product and I imagine, this being my 3rd or 4th purchase, I wouldn't still be using it if it was not so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: I start my day with a green smoothie that includes a tablespoon of these flax seeds. Of the many brands I have tried - these are my favorite. I also sprinkle them on top of a variety of baked dishes. Just a great product and decent price.
customer_reviews.author: John From MA

customer_reviews.title: High quality flax seeds
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Seem of high quality and conveniently packed in zip lock bag. Note that seeds do need to be ground prior to use but retain nutritional value longer than pre-ground seeds.
customer_reviews.author: Columbus, Ga

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and tasty
customer_reviews.text: The Golden flax seeds freshly ground tastes like fine granola on yogurt or in protein smoothies. Love it! Quick delivery. Great price. A+++
customer_reviews.author: New Leaf

customer_reviews.title: good stuff; roast them for raw breakfast serial with ...
customer_reviews.text: good stuff; roast them for raw breakfast serial with chia and other water-inflated flax seeds and home made almond milk and fresh berries
customer_reviews.author: One N.

product_meta.title: NOW Foods Certified Organic Golden Flax Seeds, 16-Ounce (Pack of 2)
